document.full_text: oman's ruler has decided to cede some legislative powers to a partially elected council, the state news agency reported on sunday, in an apparent effort to quell protests in the gulf arab sultanate.
document.title: oman sultan to cede some powers after protests
lines_and_colors: oman's ruler has decided to cede some legislative powers to a partially elected council, the state news agency reported on sunday, in an apparent effort to quell protests in the gulf arab sultanate.
